description:
This is an Essay Writing Course for Secondary School Students for all levels. It addresses the topics of writing:

- Expository Essays

- Argumentative / Persuasive Essays.

It is a 1.5 hr course with video lessons that teachers you the skills and techniques for writing compelling essays. Examples, notes and quizzes will be given to aid you on your learning journey to become a better writer.

In this course, you will learn about:

- Different types, Writing Formats and Outlines for Expository and Argumentative/Persuasive essays.

- How to plan your essay

- How to write a powerful introduction

- How to write the body section of your essay

- What is the PEEL framework for writing

- How to refute a claim

- How to write the conclusion of your essay

title: Essay Writing: Expository and Argumentative / Persuasive
